message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 is a tempting offer, I believe this product is worth more due to its unique features and benefits. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?
I understand the product's unique features and benefits, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $17,500. Can we discuss further?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we settle at $18,250? This represents a fair price considering the value it offers.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $16,500. Can we make a deal at this price?
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting close.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $17,000. This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects the true value of the product.  What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $16,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
